{"id":515313465,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1625044669,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/515313465/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double one;\n    double mul(double a,double b){\n        return a*b;\n    }\n    double qmul(int n){\n        if(n==1){\n            return one;\n        }\n        double tmp=qmul(n/2);\n        tmp=mul(tmp,tmp);\n        if(n%2==1){\n            tmp=mul(one,tmp);\n        }\n        return tmp;\n    }\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        one=x;\n        return qmul(n);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
